Home endif; ?>
WELCOME TO PONTIAC ACADEMY FOR EXCELLENCE
Pontiac Academy for Excellence is a charter school district in Pontiac, Michigan, that provides a superior educational experience by meeting the individual needs of every student from kindergarten through grade 12. Academic staff work together to ensure student success and academic achievement by providing an individual academic plan for each student. Learning occurs in a safe, overall supportive family atmosphere.
